rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A robust, open space using raw concrete finishes in line with Brutalist aesthetics and Vastu principles ensuring an auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with exposed concrete beams, large windows and a view of the central courtyard. Vastu oriented to enhance relaxation and social interaction.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen area with high ceilings, integrated Brutalist design elements and efficient layout. Placed to promote positive airflow as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom with reinforced concrete walls and minimalistic interior. Vastu recommends a North-Eastern corner for the head of the family.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Room designed for guests, featuring a simplistic design with a focus on privacy. Vastu guidelines recommend placement in the South-West.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Heavy, monolithic door with reinforced steel and concrete detailing, aligning with Brutalist style.

openings.name: Courtyard Access
openings.description: Gateway to the central courtyard ensuring natural ventilation and light. Vastu alignment ensures a smooth transition between indoors and outdoors.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Multiple strategically placed windows with deep reveals to maximize natural light while maintaining privacy, adhering to Vastu recommendations for directional alignments.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with reinforced concrete finishes, designed to accommodate joint family members while ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with a functional design to serve extended family needs, following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: Functional area for work or study, integrated into the triplex design while considering noise isolation and Vastu principles.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Robust steel and concrete staircase connecting ground to first floor, designed with safety and Vastu in mind.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Open balcony providing outdoor space with structural support, aligned with Brutalist style and Vastu recommendations for air circulation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: The final bedroom in the triplex layout, offering ample space for joint family members. The design adheres to Vastu by ensuring a balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom area on the second floor with reinforced concrete finishes and efficient plumbing layout, designed to respect Vastu water element placement.

openings.name: Emergency Exit
openings.description: Safety exit designed with robust materials and positioned in accordance with Vastu principles for rapid evacuation.

openings.name: Light Well
openings.description: Additional opening to allow natural light penetration to the upper floors, enhancing energy efficiency and meeting Vastu requirements.
